statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id ASC, customer_name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_contact WHERE id = 1;
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_contact ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT phone_number FROM customer_contact WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM customer_contact WHERE id > 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_contact WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_contact WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customer_contact JOIN purchase_history ON customer_contact.id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM customer_contact WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY name ASC, id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;

SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_method LIKE '%card%' ORDER BY amount DESC;
